Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: KelVarnson
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera!  I bought two of these at $64.99, and in retrospect it was a great value.The picture is very clear, and the color quality is quite good.  This is a wide angle camera, and two of them cover my entire front yard completely (about 40 feet deep by 75 feet wide).  Detail is sacrificed a bit for the wide angle, but the 540 line resolution helps make up for that.They are nice and low-profile, unobtrusive, but noticeable to someone who would be looking for them.  The mounting system is a little challenging to get aimed properly, but once you have it locked down, it is there to stay!One negative, the beamwidth of the IR illumination does not cover the entire view of the cam, so you end up with a bright circle in the middle of the image when in nightvision mode.  In my application I think supplemental IR illumination will be necessary.Other than that, I can highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Some things to be aware of!
Reviews.Author: N. Call "Nexus D"
Reviews.Content: These units did not ship with a power supply or cabling!!! This is a big deal when you get above 4 cameras. It adds considerable expense to hunt down your own power supplies plus cabling times X cameras. I have previously purchased the big brother to this model, they were about 89 a piece and they were much beefier, had more IR's for night vision, and came with the audio microphone, power supply, AND 60 feet of cable. While these cameras are nice, especially as a replacement for an existing camera (that already has power supply and cabling), your best value for your money comes from the next model up.

Reviews.Title: Its just OK but...
Reviews.Author: T. Foss "Tonic"
Reviews.Content: I have a personal system set up at my residence with four different cameras. I had an extra input on my DVR so I figured I would try this camera. It is built well and is made out of cast aluminum which I was surprised to see for the price. The colors are just OK for this type of camera. Better then most cheap cameras but just OK. I haven't found a camera yet that has lifelike color like my camcorder. Its due too resolution and electronics of course. My most expensive cam is $240 and my cheapest is this one. Night vision and resolution is what my goal has been when looking for the right camera. I have tried and own several high end sony super hads which are more effective for night vision (in my opinion). This camera has about a 20'x10' EFFECTIVE range(you can actually see and make out objects). I am actually watching this cam at night while I write this review and have a raccoon at about 10'. I can tell its a coon but cant tell the stripes due to resolution. This isn't actually too bad but you get what you pay for...At least that is what I have found with SOME cameras. While I will probably still use this cam for something, it probably wont be one of my cams on my DVR for long, due to the led strength. I will try to post a video review or pictures showing this cam and my others so you can see the difference.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Arcanumy
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to install and works well. I have it covering my front entrance and get a clear view of everyone who comes to the door.

Reviews.Title: good value for price
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: I bought 4 of these cameras and they work well.  They are wide angle, fixed focus.  My only issue is that the focus on them is fairly close to the camera.  anything beyond around ten feet is not in sharp focus.  You can see people and and things, but if you needed to provide a clear picture of a person at more than 10 feet, then this camera is not for you.

Reviews.Title: It's Ok, thats about it.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I install security camera's for a living and was in a bind needing to pick up a couple of these quick.For the price they are not really that bad. They got me out of a bind with the customer till I could get a quality replacement.They are about the poorest quality picture of any 600 TVL They are more the quality of a 400 TVL,, and what makes no sense is the camera has a wide view but the night vision light is a focused spot of light in the middle of your field of view. It should spread onto your entire field of view.Now if I did not install professionally I am sure this camera would have been satisfactory to me. But as much camera equipment as I deal with I feel this one falls short of a quality picture and night vision.

Reviews.Title: best I have bought so far
Reviews.Author: A. Mandeville "Somanytools"
Reviews.Content: I had been running 480's and then had a failure, so I upgraded to a 540 lines and 1/3 sony with wider angle lens.  That was a lg branded cam from another source and I liked the result but hated the install.  Seems the brackets on them just are poorly made and the knobs strip, or worse they snap off. I liked the housing mount on these so I thought I would try them.  It was a good choice.  The housing mount is excellent, and holds it aim even in high winds.  The picture is better than my other lg branded 540 1/3 and the night vision is really clear.  The other reviewer noted a brightness circle on these and there is some edge detail lost on these on really wide shots starting @ about 35 feet.  But interestingly this is better than any other camera I have for night vision. There is some edge shadow but the alternative is wash out like I have on 2 of my other three brands. (The center washes out and the edge is clear, with these the center is perfect and the edge is shadowed)All in all I like the price, quality and easy of set up here. Best of all the housing maintaining its aim and not needing bracket "adjustments" all the time.

Reviews.Title: Wrong power adapter
Reviews.Author: Steve G
Reviews.Content: Well after receiving the wrong power adapter with my camera, VideoSecu Day Night Vision CCTV Home Security Camera 1/3" SONY CCD Outdoor Vandal Proof, I called the supplier and it took about a week to get the correct power adapter, not bad. The cameras seem to do a decent job with video and although it's not hi resolution, you can still make out distinctive characteristics but not sharp enough to read the license plate of a car. Night vision is pretty good to about 30' with my camera with 26IR LEDS. System works pretty good with the CIB 500GB DVR, I need to see if I can adjust the sensitivity because bugs, flying in front of camera, can trigger the system to record, even shadows of the birds flying through detection zone will cause recordings. Anyways, I like that I can come home and click through the recordings pretty quickly and see what's been going on around my place, takes about 15 minutes to see what recorded over the last 24hrs, just make sure your detection zones aren't too big.

Reviews.Title: Deep in the heart of Texas
Reviews.Author: Smartshopper1233
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera...period.  I've only had for 2 weeks, but so far so good.  I have 7 other cameras (8 ch. DVR) and this was a replacement and the color on this camera is much better than my others on the property.  This camera also has a wider point of view which is good for more coverage.  For the price, buy it....you will be happy with it.  As far as the other reviews; most are good and I think sometimes people don't match up with proper/correct equipment.  My entire system is hard wired and this was a quick change out for me.

Reviews.Title: Sees down the block
Reviews.Author: G. B. "Strapperman"
Reviews.Content: This camera has incredible nighttime range on my well lit city street. The colors have held up very well since it has been installed and has been on non-stop for almost 1 year. Excellent camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Doris
Reviews.Content: Great security camera, works great and it has an amazing quality, good night vision quality too, it is a great tool for home an at amazing price

Reviews.Title: Defender Gets the Job done.
Reviews.Author: Louis Jackson, Sr.
Reviews.Content: Strong brilliant color and lucidity of items viewed for both day and night viewing.Recommended for both home and office indoor and outdoor observations.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: E. Cady
Reviews.Content: Bought the camera to help me put together a computer based security system.  I have had trouble with regular security systems not being able to survive voltage changes event with an APC battery and surge protection.  The system I am using will be in the Philippines and you can experience up to 10 power outages and voltage surges a day.  I believe that a computer based system will be more robust and repairable.

Reviews.Title: VIDEO SECURITY CAMERA
Reviews.Author: GUADALUPE ARAUZA
Reviews.Content: EASY TO INSTALL, WITHOUT ANY PROBLEMS. AND IT GIVES YOU  A GOOD PICTURE OF THE AREA THAT YOU WANT. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS TO ALL MY FRIENDS AND FAMILY. IT'S A GREAT LITTLE ITEM.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Bijesh Jacob
Reviews.Content: I installed this to allow us to watch the kids over the full width of our driveway and lawn and it works perfectly. The camera is has good clarity and depth. Night vision is not as good as their other model - but works ok for us.

Reviews.Title: Cost effective CCTV camera
Reviews.Author: Robert Owen
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to use inside in our living room/hallway.  It came with longer leads than other cameras I've purchased (a  good thing because it's easier to pull the leads through walls/ceilings for connection). Easy to mount and align.  The IR isn't very bright at night but it's good enough and doesn't have the bright center field that leaves other cameras with dark areas around the edge of the picture.  I'm pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu 600TVL Outdoor Day Night Infrare...
Reviews.Author: Thomas Phillips
Reviews.Content: I'VE BEEN THROUGH ALLOT OF SECURITY CAMS AND FOUND THIS IS IT FOR ME.I LOVE THE PRICE.AND IT'S SUCH A CLEAR PICTURE DAY AND NIGHT MUCH BETTER THEN THE MORE EXPENSIVE ONES I'VE BOUGHT IN THE PAST.I EVEN LIKE THE WAY THE MOUNT ON MY WALL WITH OUT STICKING OUT SO THE THE BIRDS CAN'T LAND ON THEM LOLGOING TO BUY A FEW MORE SOON.

Reviews.Title: Excellent wide angle camera
Reviews.Author: flava
Reviews.Content: Added this to my system to replace a standard camera, and resulted in a much better picture and wider field of view (perfect for near doorways).  Does not have the closeup blind spots of the cameras.  The housing is very sturdy and shows the quality of this product.  Do not get the cheaper alternatives, as you will regret it.  Planning on buying more of these.

Reviews.Title: security camera
Reviews.Author: Black Eyes "Frosed"
Reviews.Content: The price of this camera was very good for its performance.The camera is built very good and take great day and night pictures.

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: Rick78
Reviews.Content: I have 4 different security cameras ($30-60) and this is by far the best. Great resolution and nighttime IR is damn bright. No complaints!

Reviews.Title: Upgrade of exisitng camera
Reviews.Author: Ric
Reviews.Content: I had used this camera to replace my existing camera that was a 420TVL day/night camera as I needed a better picture of the street in front of my house. The picture is better in the night mode (B&W;), but the day (color) picture is still not as clear as I would like it to be, overall I have been very happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT RESOLUTION AND FULL METAL HOUSING!
Reviews.Author: The Vid Pro "The Vid Pro"
Reviews.Content: An excellent value for the price.  The image is very very good, with about 540+ TV lines.  We have several installed in a security system along side $350 cameras, and the image is very comparable. The entire housing is machined aluminum, and is black powder coated.  It will hold up well in harsh conditions.  One note: The camera is WIDE ANGLE.  We like that fact, as the picture area is larger, but it does give a somewhat parabolic "fisheye" look to the picture.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Super HAD CCD, Color DSP, Automatic CDS sensor
Horizontal Resolution: 600 TV Lines. Signal System: NTSC
f 3.6mm Lens for wide view angle. 0 Lux (IR LED ON)
Built-in 20 LED IR illuminators for night vision
12V 500mA regulated power supply and security warning sticker included
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 600TVL Outdoor IR Infrared Home Dome Security Camera Built-in 1/3" Sony Color CCD Wide Angle High Resolution Day Night for CCTV DVR Surveillance System with Bonus Power Supply 1I6
